title: Retrieve images from Status-go to generate thumbnail images in reply

labels.name: E:Desktop Community Bugfixes MVP
labels.description: Misc bug fixes about communities that are due for the MVP

body:
### Description

From PR : https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/pull/12806
Issue   : #10986 
 
> I think using only the messages received here might not generate a good map, because newMessagesLoaded only contains ~20 messages. In most cases, it should be ok, but if someone replied to an old message, then the album of messages wouldn't be part of the messages seq, so we'd also not find the images.

jrainville

In the code creates a map that solely relies on the received messages. The received message having a limit of ~20 messages, reply on an image for older messages, the code will not be able to obtain the images for that older message.
A solution would be to have access to the DB from status-go to fetch the corresponding message images and populate the Qml properties accordingly.


### Steps to reproduce

1- Find very old message with album images (more than 20 message earlier)
2- Reply to the message with album images

#### Expected behavior

- The old message images are not rendered in the reply thumbnails

#### Actual behavior

- The old message images should be rendered in the reply thumbnails

### Additional information

- https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/10986
- https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/pull/12806
